title: "The Role of Organic Agriculture in Enhancing Soil Health and Biodiversity"
content: You can focus on how organic farming methods, like crop rotation, composting, and reduced chemical use, contribute to healthier soil ecosystems and increased biodiversity on farms. Highlight how organic practices can restore soil fertility, improve water retention, and support a variety of species that are often harmed by conventional farming methods.
author: Praveen Thumati
